Content.Knowledge Point: What is content creation and why it's important
Content.Text: Content creation is the process of creating engaging content for your customers. It helps keep them informed about your brand, makes them feel part of your journey, and builds trust. By creating content, you can charge a premium and have a loyal customer base.

There are eight types of content: business and brand, product, lifestyle, testimonials and product reviews, behind the scenes, user-generated content, themed, timely content, and promotions and campaigns.
This type of content introduces your brand to new customers, shares updates about your business, and provides a human element to your brand.
Showcase your actual product through photos and videos, and add photo tags if you have an Instagram shop set up.
Show your product in action with human presence to humanize your product and provide a realistic perspective.
Showcase feedback from your customers to build trust and increase the chances of potential customers ordering from you.
Show what goes on behind the scenes to humanize your brand and create transparency.
Leverage content created by your customers to showcase your brand's real-life impact.
Create content based on holidays, special occasions, or random fun holidays to make it timely and relevant.
Create content for promotions, campaigns, flash sales, and discounts to encourage customers to take action.
